title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class. The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When the method `onStartup` is executed in the `ModuleInitializer` class, the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of the expected output "MySomeClass".
EB: The method `onStartup` in the `ModuleInitializer` class should output "MySomeClass" instead of "MySomeAnn".
